channel.title: Problem with controls...?
channel.description:
So, I realized while playing that my weapons weren't doing the fast switchy thing, and I proceeded to the options to rectify this. I check the appropriate box, click ok, and click apply. Get back in the game and I'm still not switching weapons all fast-like. Try again and again just to make sure I'm not doing something wrong and it still doesn't work. I bring up the developer's console to see exactly what the game is doing and I realize that every time I hit apply, this pops up:
[code] exec: couldn't exec userconfig.cfg Host_WriteConfiguration: Wrote cfg/config.cfg Using joystick 'Xbox360 controller' configuration JOY_AXIS_X: mapped to Side (absolute) JOY_AXIS_Y: mapped to Forward (absolute) JOY_AXIS_Z: unmapped JOY_AXIS_R: mapped to Look (absolute) JOY_AXIS_U: mapped to Turn (absolute) JOY_AXIS_V: unmapped Advanced Joystick settings initialized [/code]
So, what the eff?
